title: Honor level 0
body: Hey, i got banned for some offensive language in the start of the honor system. Now i am very reformed and get honors almost every game and some times i get all of them. When can i recieve honor level 1? This has been for like 2-4 months

replies.body: By playing enough honorable games and getting honored, over time you'll get back up to the higher honor ranks. Keep in mind that while something may not get you punished immediately, some behavior can hold weight against your honor level.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=lkycbgkP,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-30T04:28:48.613+0000)
>
> By playing enough honorable games and getting honored, over time you'll get back up to the higher honor ranks. Keep in mind that while something may not get you punished immediately, some behavior can hold weight against your honor level.

Does that mean that while you dont receive chat restrictions or bans, negative behaviour can lower your honor level/hinder your honor progress ?
If i do not receive any reports, how long will this take exactly?
It'd be different for everyone, but it mostly depends on how many games you're playing and any possible dishonorable/toxic behavior.
